author: cnbc.com
title: JMP reports 4Q loss
text:
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) _ JMP Group Inc. (JMP) on Wednesday reported a loss of $1.4 million in its fourth quarter.
The San Francisco-based company said it had a loss of 6 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, came to 16 cents per share.
The nvestment banking and asset services company posted revenue of $30.3 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported a loss of $15.9 million, or 74 cents per share, swinging to a loss in the period. Revenue was reported as $109.9 million.
JMP shares have dropped roughly 2 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $5.50, a fall of 14 percent in the last 12 months.
